general_rules_msgs.opening_lines: In this game, you will play Tic Tac Toe against a computer player.
general_rules_msgs.rules_1: This game will assume that you are familiar with the gameplay and rules of Tic Tac Toe.
general_rules_msgs.rules_2:
RULES:
 - First to win 3 points wins the game.
 - You win a point by winning an individual Tic Tac Toe match.
 - Who goes first gets swapped for each new match.
general_rules_msgs.rules_3:
- You will always go first when you first play the game
 - Your mark will always be 'x'
 - Computers mark will always be 'o'

choice_layout_msgs.opening_line: To choose a square to mark, pick a number that corresponds to its square on the board.
choice_layout_msgs.choice_given: You will be given the choice to choose the conventional number layout or the numpad layout after these rules.
choice_layout_msgs.concluding_line: Your square will be marked with an 'x' once you make your choice.
